trans-unit.source: … against EPO/OPS and display the results. You will be able to step through result pages and display fulltext- and family-information, but running custom queries will be disabled.
trans-unit.target: … against EPO/OPS and display the results. You will be able to step through result pages and display fulltext- and family-information, but running custom queries will be disabled.

trans-unit.source: A picture says a thousand words.
trans-unit.target: 一幅画能说明千言万语。

trans-unit.source: About
trans-unit.target: 关于我们

trans-unit.source: After four years of development, the source code finally gets released under an open source license in 2017. We are looking forward to opening up the development process as well, every kind of participation and support is very much welcome.
trans-unit.target: 经过四年的开发,源码终于在2017年得到开源许可发布。我们也期待着开放开发的过程,非常欢迎各种形式的参与和支持。

trans-unit.target: 辅助数据来源:

trans-unit.target: CIPO

trans-unit.target: 连接到多种服务,以获取pdf、图像、书目数据和全文。

trans-unit.source: Dossier management. Manage different collections of patent documents and apply ratings and comments.
trans-unit.target: 档案管理。管理不同的专利文件集,并应用评级和评论。

trans-unit.target: EPO/OPS

trans-unit.source: Features
trans-unit.target: 特点

trans-unit.source: For enterprises, dedicated commercial support is also available through Elmyra UG. Elmyra UG is the software development company that’s spearheading the ongoing development and as such will ensure continuity for the project.
trans-unit.target: For enterprises, dedicated commercial support is also available through Elmyra UG. Elmyra UG is the software development company that’s spearheading the ongoing development and as such will ensure continuity for the project.

trans-unit.source: Getting started
trans-unit.target: 开始

trans-unit.source: Getting started with the software or deploying it yourself is quite easy if you are familiar with Python. We will only cover development here, see the install documentation page about how to install, configure and run an instance. The software should work on any other Linux or BSD distribution, but this is beyond the scope of the README.
trans-unit.target: Getting started with the software or deploying it yourself is quite easy if you are familiar with Python. We will only cover development here, see the install documentation page about how to install, configure and run an instance. The software should work on any other Linux or BSD distribution, but this is beyond the scope of the README.

trans-unit.source: History
trans-unit.target: 历程

trans-unit.source: IFI Claims
trans-unit.target: IFI索赔

trans-unit.source: If you’re using PatZilla in your company and you need support or custom development or support, feel free to get in touch with us. We are happy to receive respective inquiries at info@elmyra.de.
trans-unit.target: If you’re using PatZilla in your company and you need support or custom development or support, feel free to get in touch with us. We are happy to receive respective inquiries at info@elmyra.de.

trans-unit.source: In this way, you are contributing to the ongoing maintenance and further development of PatZilla. As it still is a reasonably young project, it needs all support it can get.
trans-unit.target: 通过这种方式,您将为PatZilla的持续维护和进一步发展做出贡献。由于它仍然是一个相当年轻的项目,它需要得到所有的支持。

trans-unit.source: It is and will always be free and open source software.
trans-unit.target: 它是并且将永远是免费的开源软件。

trans-unit.source: It runs on Python 2.7, but is not ready for Python 3.6 yet. Contributions are welcome!
trans-unit.target: 它运行在Python 2.7上,但还没有准备好迎接Python 3.6。欢迎大家的贡献

trans-unit.target: 许可证

trans-unit.target: MTC depa.tech

trans-unit.source: Multiple data source APIs.
trans-unit.target: 多个数据源API。

trans-unit.source: Multitenancy. The software can operate on behalf of different vendors. It’s easy to apply custom branding.
trans-unit.target: Multitenancy. The software can operate on behalf of different vendors. It’s easy to apply custom branding.

trans-unit.source: PatZilla documentation
trans-unit.target: PatZilla文件

trans-unit.source: PatZilla is a modular patent information research platform and data integration toolkit. It features an efficient user interface and access to multiple data sources.
trans-unit.target: PatZilla是一个模块化的专利信息研究平台和数据集成工具包。它的特点是高效的用户界面和对多个数据源的访问。

trans-unit.source: PatZilla is a modular patent information research platform and data integration toolkit. It features a modern user interface and access to multiple data sources.
trans-unit.target: PatZilla是一个模块化的专利信息研究平台和数据集成工具包。它的特点是现代化的用户界面和对多个数据源的访问。

trans-unit.target: PatZilla:人类的专利信息研究

trans-unit.source: Project information
trans-unit.target: 项目信息

trans-unit.source: REST API. Through the extensive REST API, all functionality is available to 3rd-party systems. Deep integration has no limits.
trans-unit.target: REST API。通过广泛的REST API,所有的功能都可以提供给第三方系统。深度集成没有限制。

trans-unit.source: Screenshot
trans-unit.target: 截图

trans-unit.source: Sharing. Well-designed collaboration features allow efficient sharing of information with your colleagues and partners, even across the boundaries of in-house systems.
trans-unit.target: 共享。精心设计的协作功能允许与您的同事和合作伙伴高效共享信息,甚至跨越内部系统的界限。

trans-unit.source: Support
trans-unit.target: 技术支持

trans-unit.source: Thanks in advance for your efforts, we really appreciate any help or feedback.
trans-unit.target: 提前感谢您的努力,我们真的很感谢您的帮助和反馈。

trans-unit.source: The numberlist demo will display the patent documents DE102011075997A1, DE102011076020A1, DE102011076022A1 and DE102011076035A1. This is a showcase about how to integrate a link to a list of patent documents into own applications.
trans-unit.target: The numberlist demo will display the patent documents DE102011075997A1, DE102011076020A1, DE102011076022A1 and DE102011076035A1. This is a showcase about how to integrate a link to a list of patent documents into own applications.

trans-unit.source: The nasa-public-domain demo displays the latest NASA patents put under the public domain.
trans-unit.target: The nasa-public-domain demo displays the latest NASA patents put under the public domain.

trans-unit.source: The search demo will run the fixed query:
trans-unit.target: The search demo will run the fixed query:

trans-unit.source: The document view demo will display the patent document EP0666666A2 without any control elements. This is a showcase about how to embed the document view into own applications or how to directly link to single documents.
trans-unit.target: The document view demo will display the patent document EP0666666A2 without any control elements. This is a showcase about how to embed the document view into own applications or how to directly link to single documents.

trans-unit.source: The IP Navigator uses different API services for accessing patent information.
trans-unit.target: IP导航仪使用不同的API服务来访问专利信息。

trans-unit.source: The software got some applause from professional researchers for its unique user interface and rich feature set when it was released to the first audience in 2014. We hear from our users they are still having a great pleasure working with it on a daily basis.
trans-unit.target: 这款软件在2014年向第一批用户发布时,以其独特的用户界面和丰富的功能得到了专业研究人员的一些掌声。我们从用户那里听到,他们在日常工作中仍然非常愉快地使用它。

trans-unit.source: The source code of the »IP Navigator« is available under an open source license using the brand name »PatZilla«. For further details, please visit:
trans-unit.target: The source code of the »IP Navigator« is available under an open source license using the brand name »PatZilla«. For further details, please visit:

trans-unit.source: The system provides convenient access to the OPS service from EPO and other professional fulltext patent databases in its standalone version. You can also use its software components and interfaces for building arbitrary vendor solutions.
trans-unit.target: 该系统以其独立版本的形式提供了对EPO和其他专业全文专利数据库的OPS服务的便捷访问。您也可以使用它的软件组件和接口来构建任意的供应商解决方案。

trans-unit.source: This software is copyright © 2013-2019 The PatZilla authors. All rights reserved.
trans-unit.target: This software is copyright © 2013-2019 The PatZilla authors. All rights reserved.

trans-unit.source: USPTO/PATIMG
trans-unit.target: 美国专利局/PATIMG

trans-unit.source: Use different patent search services with varying coverage.
trans-unit.target: 使用不同的专利检索服务,覆盖面不同。

trans-unit.source: Use of the source code included here is governed by the GNU Affero General Public License and the European Union Public License. Please also have a look at the notices about licenses of third-party components.
trans-unit.target: Use of the source code included here is governed by the GNU Affero General Public License and the European Union Public License. Please also have a look at the notices about licenses of third-party components.

trans-unit.source: User interface. Based on contemporary web technologies and responsive design, it works on multiple devices. Use it on PCs, tablets, smartphone devices or as a multi-screen solution. The clear and well-arranged design and layout permits efficient screening of large numbers of patent documents.
trans-unit.target: 用户界面。基于当代网络技术和响应式设计,可在多种设备上使用。可在个人电脑、平板电脑、智能手机设备上使用,也可作为多屏解决方案使用。清晰而有序的设计和布局可以有效地筛选大量的专利文件。

trans-unit.source: We are always happy to receive code contributions, ideas, suggestions and problem reports from the community. Spend some time taking a look around, locate a bug, design issue or spelling mistake and then send us a pull request or create an issue.
trans-unit.target: We are always happy to receive code contributions, ideas, suggestions and problem reports from the community. Spend some time taking a look around, locate a bug, design issue or spelling mistake and then send us a pull request or create an issue.
